synopsis.text:
Shuu hei, a talented basketball player, has unknowingly captured the heart of a young girl named Seara. Since her early childhood, Seara has been enamored with Shuuhei, following him everywhere and dreaming of the day they would be together. As she grew older, Seara's determination to be with Shuuhei only intensified. When her parents decided to move to America, Seara chose to stay behind and live with Shuuhei's family, hoping this would bring her closer to the one she loves.

However, Shuuhei, now a few years older, seems to have forgotten about his young admirer. Despite Seara's best efforts to remind him of their past connection, Shuuhei remains oblivious, showing more interest in other women. Seara's journey to win Shuuhei's heart is filled with challenges, as she competes with other women for his affection and struggles to make him see her as more than just a childhood friend.

As Seara navigates the complexities of love and growing up, she remains steadfast in her pursuit of Shuuhei. Will she be able to rekindle Shuuhei's memory of their past and make him fall in love with her? Only time will tell in this heartwarming tale of first love and self-discovery.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
